articles.title: Libyan GPC Secretary Meets DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Libyan GPC Secretary Meets DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The secretary of the General People's Congress (GPC) of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya met with the delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on a visit to Libya on June 10.
					 He said that it is the steadfast will of Libya to steadily boost the relations with the DPRK. 
					
					 He reiterated Libya's full support for the Korean people in their struggle, expressing the hope that Korea would be reunified as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was conveyed to woman centenarian Kim Tok Sun residing in Toksan-dong, Kanggye City, Jagang Province.
					 She experienced bitter sorrow over being a member of the stateless nation. She could not lead a worthy life till the country was liberated. Thanks to free medical care she kept herself healthy.
					
					 She worked hard at different posts, prompted by her single desire to repay the loving care shown by the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader for her. She kept herself busy even after she became a pensioner. 
					
					 She is always optimistic in her life, having balanced diet.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed for Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoys high praises and unquestioned trust from the fellow countrymen for having performed the undying leadership feats for national reunification stirring the nation to go down in its history.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Aware of the importance and urgency of the issue of national reunification long ago, he has devoted his all to accomplishing the cause of national independence and that of national reunification for the last several decades.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, possessed of outstanding political vision and sharp insight, scientifically proved through his tireless ideological and theoretical activities the validity and truth of idea and line on the national reunification and policies on the country's reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung at every phase of the revolutionary development, providing immortal great programmes for independent reunification to the fellow countrymen.     
					
					 The historic north-south joint declaration adopted a decade ago is crystal of Kim Jong Il's idea and will for independent reunification. 
					
					 In the whole course of steering the cause of national reunification, he has always firmly adhered to the principle of independence and the Juche-based stand and led the Koreans to settle the issue of the country's reunification by their concerted efforts in line with their will and interests. 
					
					 He has wisely steered the nationwide struggle for preserving and implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 A solid foundation was laid for accomplishing the nation's independent reunification thanks to his outstanding and tested leadership over the struggle for the reunification to serve the country and the nation.
					
					 The Koreans feel the highest dignity and pride of holding him as the nation's leader in high esteem and the Korean nation has become unshakable in its faith and will to achieve the country's reunification without fail true to his idea and will.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Mull Provocative War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Mull Provocative War Exercises
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The first fleet of the south Korean puppet navy is mulling staging the five day-long anti-submarine mobile exercises in coordinated operations with the maritime police in the East Sea of Korea from June 14, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The puppet warmongers will reportedly stage the drill of dropping anti-submarine depth bombs, etc. with more than 10 warships including destroyers and patrol boats and helicopters involved. 
					
					 They blustered that they would stage an exercise of seizing trading vessels of the DPRK during this period. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors referred the case of warship sinking, a sheer fabrication, to the UN forum in a bid to instigate it to slap additional sanctions against the DPRK. Not content with this, the group is getting evermore frantic with provocative exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK, driving the situation to the worst crisis.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was published in pamphlet by the Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on June 7.

articles.title: Mexican Political Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Mexican Political Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement on June 4 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il has developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung on the basis of a comprehensive and profound study of the history of the Korean people's struggle and strategy and tactics of the revolution, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					  Kim Jong Il has pursued the Songun politics based on the Juche idea, protecting the dignity and sovereignty of socialist Korea and achieving the unshakable unity and cohesion between the Party and the masses. 
					
					 The WPK has developed into a single-minded united party under his leadership.
					
					 The WPK's political philosophy of believing in the people as in Heaven helped the Korean people overcome difficulties facing all fronts of the revolution and construction.
					
					 The truth about the smear campaign being staged by the south Korean authorities against the DPRK, linking it with the case of the warship "Cheonan" sinking, is bound to be probed and the socialist cause accomplished in Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 The heroic struggle of the WPK and the Korean people led by
					
					 Kim Jong Il is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of solidarity with the Korean people was held at the building of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico on June 4 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present there were personages of different political parties and organizations and other political figures, media persons and public figures of Mexico. The DPRK ambassador to Mexico was present there on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, accused the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of deliberately staging a brigandish farce, a conspiratorial charade over the case of south Korean warship's sinking, kicking off anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria. 
					
					 With the passage of time it is becoming clear that the above-said case was a sheer fabrication and a conspiratorial farce orchestrated by the Lee group at the U.S. instigation and under its patronage, he said, and went on:
					
					 The enemies had better behave themselves, properly understanding the tremendous military muscle of the DPRK and its people's fixed will, pluck and determination. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il will decisively smash the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group with the might of Songun.

articles.title: 10th Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed
articles.content:
10th Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The Staffordshire, Britain, Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on June 7 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 The statement noted that the adoption and publication of the joint declaration in Pyongyang in June of 2000 marked an epochal event in the modern history of Korea.
					
					 The spirit of "By our nation itself", the core of the joint declaration, calls for achieving the reunification of Korea by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					 The implementation of the joint declaration opened up a bright prospect of achieving Korean reunification for the first time since the division on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 However, the process of reconciliation and cooperation on the peninsula was brought back to the dark period of confrontation after the Lee Myung Bak group came to power.
					
					 The present situation on the peninsula has grown extremely tense owing to the reckless moves of the Lee group.
					
					 In case a new war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, it may develop into a global war. 
					
					 We appeal to all the British progressive organizations and people to wage a positive movement for supporting the peaceful reunification of Korea and the struggle of the south Korean people and urge the south Korean authorities to implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and opt for achieving the reunification of the peninsula.
